description:
Crowleer is a fast and flexible CLI web crawler with focus on pages download. It was created with simplicity, control and interfaceability in mind.

### Usage

You can find usage information on the project's [GitHub page](https://github.com/ERap320/CrowLeer).

### Donate

If this program helped you, consider offering the developer a coffee.

[![BMC](https://www.buymeacoffee.com/assets/img/custom_images/black_img.png)](https://www.buymeacoffee.com/erap320)
summary: Powerful C++ web crawler based on libcurl
author: ERap320
